text:
Looker - SF Bay (Santa Cruz), NYC, and London - Full-time positions across the company. Great culture, mentorship, opportunity to help scale the company.

http://www.looker.com/

Jobs Page: http://www.looker.com/careers

Hiring developers, analysts (pre-sales, implementation, and engagement), DBAs, etc.

We've just recently raised our Series B from Meritech Capital and are looking to grow the team with strong, eager, willing to learn, and collaborative team members.

If interested feel free to reach out!
